about_the_game:
All aboard! Welcome to TrainTastic, the intense shared screen fighting game, that puts you in control of trains spread across various different themes, ranging from space to toy room to Wild West and so much more! You'll jump shoot and destroy your competition - these are apparently some weird trains.

You'll have to learn the different arenas, pick up train themed power ups, a variety of weapons, and use tracks for speed boosts! Make sure you can go full steam ahead!

  • Play with up to three people in local multiplayer or with Steam Remote play, or even add in some AI players to fill the gaps! Test your skills and reflexes against your former friends, now enemies!
  • Platformer arena battles - Learn the maps to dominate. Many come with different hazards and obstacles, that you need to dodge and survive all while fighting off the other trains
  • Tons of fun levels and themes in each level - jump through time and space, in so many places trains shouldn't be!
  • Fun variety of weapons and powerups - turn your cheery locomotive into a powerhouse machine, doing whatever is necessary to conquer the enemy
